name: EAR_ID
description: This table contains the Identity IDs assigned to the guarantor record.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this row. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this row.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Date the ID is effective from for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_TO_DATE
columns.description: Date the ID is effective to for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_RET_CHK_PP_ID
columns.description: Stores the code used to assign a National Provider ID.

columns.name: MPI_RET_CHK_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the rule used to assign a National Provider ID
